summary:

Earlier this year we stayed at a hotel in Berlin.
They had a little sign that said if we opted not to have our towels washed, they'd give us a present.
On our last day, we were given a little packet of mixed seeds to plant when we got home.
The results so far have been delightful ðŸ¥°
